features: SD Card Local Storage Audio Detection Motion Detection Built-in Microphone Built-in Speaker
securityfeatures: Administrator protection Password authentication HTTP and RTSP authentication
protocols: IPv4 ARP TCP/IP UDP ICMP DHCP HTTP HTTPS UPnP RTCP RTP RTSP
systemrequirements: iPhone and iPad using iOS 5.1.1 or higher Android 4.01 or higher
marketinginformation: Keep an eye on your little one with the DCS-825L Wi-Fi Baby Camera. This portable camera transforms your mobile device into a versatile, yet easy to use baby monitor. Connect to the camera wirelessly or through the Internet so you can check on your infant no matter where you are.
